content.question: Which of the following is true regarding the salons of the eighteenth century?

choices.label: They were exclusively a French phenomenon.
They discussed social questions as well as literary works.
They were held exclusively at royal courts.
They were endorsed by traditional religious leaders.

content.answer: They discussed social questions as well as literary works.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
